game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the ancient artifact from the ruins.
game.description: In a forgotten land, an elusive artifact is said to be hidden within the ruins. Uncover its location and bring it back to the quest giver.

task.description: Explore the dense forest to the east until you find the entrance to the ancient ruins.
Navigate through the booby-trapped corridors of the ruins without triggering any fatal mechanisms.
Conquer the mythical beast that guards the artifact to prove your worth.
